mapper.select: SELECT b.b_no , b.title , b.user_id , b.reg_date , t.views FROM board b INNER JOIN trav_board t ON b.b_no = t.trav_b_no WHERE b.user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM follow WHERE follower_id = 'user01' ) OR b.user_id IN ( SELECT id FROM users WHERE grade_level = 6 ) OR b.user_id = 'user01' ORDER BY b.b_no DESC

mapper.update: update trav_board set views= views+1 where trav_b_no=#{trav_b_no}
